title: So Pittballs is back with a vengeance

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

nothings changed, was trash then, is trash now. 

Ban inc for that scrub

Could it be? The manuscripts were real! The prophecy is true!
AP riven? Triple Mobies LB? Revive TP Teemo? HAIL PITBALLZ
